name: 機器人地圖建立與定位
description: This course covers a variety of topics and issues in applied AI: computer vision, mobile robotics, and multi-robot systems. These abstract components are grounded in the problem of robotic soccer. A selection of topics covered during lectures are: Image segmentation, Optical flow analysis, Ego-motion estimation, Localization, and Mapping.
goals: 瞭解機器人導航之原理
瞭解機器人導航之各種技術，能夠撰寫程式以控制機器人
熟悉機器人所需之機電整合所需技術
培養問題導向的思維和研究之能力
提升工程問題理解之能力，能夠分析各種機器人相關問題及設計解決方案
能夠搜尋相關技術文獻，提升自我學習之能力
能夠以小組方式進行主題式研究，培養團隊合作之能力
syllabus:
Week 1-2: Introduction to localization and mapping for navigation

Week 3-4: The fundamentals of probability theory for Localization and mapping

Week 5-6: Localization: motion models, sensor models, and Monte Carlo method, particle filter

Week 7-8: Eigenvectors and singular value decomposition

Week 9-10: Incremental closest point algorithm

Week 11-12: Introduction to computer vision, thresholding, histograms, edge detection, Sobel, and Laplacian

Week 13-14: Convolution, segmentation, and integral image

Week 15-16: Visual SLAM, SIFT and SURF features

Week 17: Visual SLAM - Bundle adjustment

Week 18: Final Exam

grading.note: A midterm exam will be held after approximately the first half of the course.
A final exam will examine all material learned by the students.
